vclaim: New York hospitals are not releasing babies to their unvaccinated parents, and are requiring parents to show a vaccine passport in order to have their child released from the neonatal intensive care unit (NICU) into their care.
title: Are NY Hospitals Not Letting Unvaccinated Parents Take Their Newborn Babies Home?
subtitle: Current research says that the risk of a newborn getting COVID-19 from a parent is low.
author: Nur Ibrahim
